businessRules.rule:
SET @Session_OPU_Code=@OPU_Code SELECT @Session_DefaultCurrency = DefaultCurrency, @Session_ProjectEnabled = ISNULL(ProjectEnabled, 0), @Session_SiteCodeEnabled = ISNULL(SiteCodeEnabled, 0), @Session_Country=Country, @Session_Expence_AC=Expence_AC, @Company_Code=CompanyID FROM tbl_BranchInfo WHERE BranchID = @OPU_Code
SELECT @Session_LocatorYN = LocatorYN FROM tbl_Store WHERE Store_ID = @Store_ID
SET @Session_TotLoc=0
IF IsNull(@Session_LocatorYN,0) > 0 SELECT @Session_TotLoc=COUNT(*) FROM Dimension_Lookups WHERE IsNull(IsParentYN,0)=1 and Store_ID = @Store_ID
Update Users Set OPU_Code=@OPU_Code, Company_Code=@Company_Code, Store_ID=@Store_ID, LocatorYN = @Session_LocatorYN, TotLoc=@Session_TotLoc WHERE UserID=@BusinessRules_UserId
